name: Zoot Sims
description:
'''John Haley''' "'''Zoot'''" '''Sims''' (October 29, 1925 â€“ March 23, 1985) was an American [[jazz]] saxophonist, playing mainly tenor but also alto (and, later, soprano) saxophone. He first gained attention in the "Four Brothers" sax section of [[Woody Herman]]'s big band, afterward enjoying a long solo career, often in partnership with fellow saxmen [[Gerry Mulligan]] and [[Al Cohn]].
